summary: Young filmmakers document their colleague's budding online friendship with a young woman and her family which leads to an unexpected series of discoveries.
cast: Nev Schulman|Ariel Schulman|Henry Joost|Angela Wesselman-Pierce|Melody C. Roscher|Wendy Whelan|Craig Hall|Tiler Peck|Drew Jacoby|Rubi Pronk|Adrian Danchig-Waring|Blake Alexandros
title: Catfish
